bib_record.title: Kinetic energy of fragments in 235U fission by neutrons of energy 0-0.6 MeV

0.free_text: Average number of prompt neutrons derived from measured mass and kinetic energy distributions.

free_txt: fission fragments energies measurement - LF and HF in
Statistical errors of mass and energy distributions
here YM -  mass-yield of fragments with given
N- a number of the registered fragments
at the fission of U-235 by neutrons
Thermal neutrons were obtained by the fast neutrons
Measurements by turns of fast and thermal neutrons.
Mass and energy distributions of fragments at
the fission of U-235 by thermal neutrons were used for
the graduation of energy scale of the analyzer.
NU-values have been obtained on the basis of energy
NUthermal= 2.418 - average prompt neutron yield at
NUthermal(M) - mass dependence of NU at thermal neutron
fission ( not mentioned, measured in this experiment or
from an other experiment or from an evaluation).
Data for the neutron energy En=0.73,1.08,
1.33,1.69 MeV are obtained on the basis
of the results given in the article
